forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a blanket of clouds gently envelops the skyline, reflecting the characteristic embrace of the coastal marine layer. With temperatures expected to dip to a mild 57, a light wind whispers through the streets, making it an ideal night for those seeking a quiet stroll or a coffee at a cozy café. The day has offered moments of sunshine, but tonight leans into the comforting gray, creating a serene backdrop for the city’s vibrant life.

Tomorrow greets us with the promise of clearer skies, as the sun will break through the cloud cover and bring warmth, with highs nearing 65. The southwest winds will provide a refreshing touch, so those venturing outdoors might wish to dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater over a T-shirt—to easily adapt to the shifting temperatures. With such a pleasant forecast, a day spent exploring local parks or sampling artisan food from neighborhood stalls sounds inviting. The city will surely come alive under the sun’s embrace, offering countless opportunities to enjoy the harmony of warmth and the lingering coolness of the Bay.
